about_the_game:
Put your feet up & let your hair down, and spend some time filling an empty void with a vibrant little landscape. Biotopia aims to be a perfect companion while listening to a podcast or an audio book, with its addictive yet unobtrusive gameplay.



Earn points by connecting tiles with similar biomes, and earn coveted bonus tiles by planning your placements carefully. Enjoy getting into the zone and staying there, plopping down pieces one by one and making the world grow.



Diversity increases as your landscape expands, and new biomes will unlock when you reach certain milestones. All these can attract different kinds of wildlife; each with their own requirements and desires. Try finding them all, and complete the expansive ingame biotopedia.


  • Highscore mode if you want to challenge yourself and unlock a bunch of achievements.
  • Endless mode if you prefer to relax and play in your own way without any failure states.
  • Creative mode if you'd rather be a worldscaper and paint the world as you see fit.


Biotopia is under active development by a single person. If you have any questions, suggestions or feedback I would love to hear from you!

I'm putting together a demo ASAP, so wishlist and follow to get it as soon as it’s available! <3
